title: How to Make Vegan Banana Bread

steps.headline: Sift the flour, baking powder and baking soda into a medium size bowl.
Cream the vegan margarine, brown sugar and vanilla extract in another medium size bowl until the mixture is light and fluffy.
Mash the soft bananas with soy milk in a small bowl, you can add a few optional dashes of cinnamon (cinnamon is excellent for regulating blood sugar).
Pour the banana mixture into the sugar mixture to combine.
Add the flour to the wet mix.
steps.description: Stir with a spatula or wooden spoon. You can fold in cup of chopped walnuts or pecans and/ or  cup vegan chocolate chips.

steps.headline: Grease a loaf pan with vegan margarine or coconut oil, for an added flavor.
Spoon the mix into the loaf pan and bake at 350 degrees for 50-55 minutes.
steps.description: Do not over bake. A knife inserted into the bread might be a bit gooey, especially if you add vegan chocolate chips. A slightly sticky knife at the 55 minute mark is OK, unless you like your bread dry.

steps.headline: Cool on a wire rack for an hour before serving.

text: Sift the flour, baking powder and baking soda into a medium size bowl.  Cream the vegan margarine, brown sugar and vanilla extract in another medium size bowl until the mixture is light and fluffy.  Mash the soft bananas with soy milk in a small bowl, you can add a few optional dashes of cinnamon (cinnamon is excellent for regulating blood sugar).  Pour the banana mixture into the sugar mixture to combine.  Add the flour to the wet mix. Stir with a spatula or wooden spoon. You can fold in cup of chopped walnuts or pecans and/ or  cup vegan chocolate chips. Grease a loaf pan with vegan margarine or coconut oil, for an added flavor.  Spoon the mix into the loaf pan and bake at 350 degrees for 50-55 minutes. Do not over bake. A knife inserted into the bread might be a bit gooey, especially if you add vegan chocolate chips. A slightly sticky knife at the 55 minute mark is OK, unless you like your bread dry. Cool on a wire rack for an hour before serving.
